tldr: Use of `mobius1-selectr` is commonly linked to the use of `cdn.polyfill[.]io`, which was taken over by attackers and serves harmful code. `polyfill` itself is not included in this library, but integration is possible.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you use `mobius1-selectr` and you have included `cdn.polyfill[.]io` script resources on any of your web pages.
how_to_fix: Remove the use of `cdn.polyfill[.]io` across your application.
